00019 #ifndef _IPL98_IMAGECONSTROWIT_H
00020 #define _IPL98_IMAGECONSTROWIT_H
00021 
00022 #include "ipl98_types.h"
00023 #include "../kernel_c/image/kernel_functions.h"
00024 
00025 namespace ipl{ // use namespace if C++
00026 
00037 template<class T>
00038 class CImageConstRowIterator
00039 {
00040 protected: // attributes
00042     T* m_pCurr;
00044         T* m_pEnd;
00045 public:
00051         inline CImageConstRowIterator(T* pActualRow, UINT32 StartIndex, UINT32 MaxIndex);
00053         inline CImageConstRowIterator& operator=(const CImageConstRowIterator& It);
00056         inline CImageConstRowIterator End() const;
00058         inline CImageConstRowIterator& operator++() { m_pCurr++; return *this; }
00060         inline CImageConstRowIterator operator++(int) { CImageConstRowIterator t=*this; m_pCurr++; return t;}
00062         inline const T& operator*(){return *m_pCurr;}
00064         inline const T& operator[](UINT32 i) {return *(m_pCurr+i);}
00067         inline friend bool operator==(const CImageConstRowIterator& p, const CImageConstRowIterator& q);
00070         inline friend bool operator!=(const CImageConstRowIterator& p, const CImageConstRowIterator& q);
00073         inline friend bool operator< (const CImageConstRowIterator& p, const CImageConstRowIterator& q);
00074 };
00075 
00076 template<class T>
00077 inline CImageConstRowIterator<T>::CImageConstRowIterator(T* pActualRow, UINT32 StartIndex, UINT32 MaxIndex):
00078                 m_pEnd(pActualRow + MaxIndex), m_pCurr(pActualRow+StartIndex)
00079 {
00080 }
00081 
00082 template<class T>
00083 inline CImageConstRowIterator<T>& CImageConstRowIterator<T>::operator=(const CImageConstRowIterator& It)
00084 {
00085         m_pCurr = It.m_pCurr;
00086         m_pEnd  = It.m_pEnd;
00087         return *this;
00088 }
00089 
00090 template<class T>
00091 inline CImageConstRowIterator<T> CImageConstRowIterator<T>::End() const
00092 {
00093         CImageConstRowIterator t = *this;
00094         t.m_pCurr = m_pEnd;
00095         return t;
00096 }
00097 
00098 template<class T>
00099 inline bool operator==(const CImageConstRowIterator<T>& p, const CImageConstRowIterator<T>& q)
00100 {
00101         return (p.m_pCurr==q.m_pCurr);
00102 }
00103 
00104 template<class T>
00105 inline bool operator!=(const CImageConstRowIterator<T>& p, const CImageConstRowIterator<T>& q)
00106 {
00107         return !(p==q);
00108 }
00109 
00110 template<class T>
00111 inline bool operator<(const CImageConstRowIterator<T>& p, const CImageConstRowIterator<T>& q)
00112 {
00113         return (p.m_pCurr<q.m_pCurr);
00114 }
00115 
00116 } // end namespace ipl
00117 
00118 #endif //_IPL98_IMAGECONSTROWIT_H
